constituent: abolish, cave, dicharge, teepee, wigwam, two, human legs
koohiiStory1: Slaves have been discharged from the caves where they were kept thanks to the abolition of slavery.
koohiiStory2: Guns were abolished, so gun enthusiats left for the hills to discharge their guns in caves.
readingExamples: 廃る (すた.る), 廃れる (すた.れる)
words:
荒廃(こうはい): ruin
廃れる(すたれる): to go out of use, to become obsolete, to die out, to go out of fashion
廃棄(はいき): annullment, disposal, abandon, scrap, discarding, repeal
廃止(はいし): abolition, repeal
